extension.news: If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please buy me [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"a cup of coffee"[/COLOR][/B] by scanning the QR code or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR].[CR][CR][COLOR gold]Latest Update:[/COLOR][CR]v1.4.3[CR] - updated screenshots
extension.summary: Papaw's AZR Redux is gebaseerd op de originele Arctic Zephyr-skin gemaakt door jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux gaat over eenvoudig, strak, minimalistisch en uiterst aanpasbaar.
Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.
Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.
Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.
AZR Redux de Papaw se basa en el aspecto original de Arctic Zephyr creado por jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se trata de ser simple, limpio, minimalista y extremadamente personalizable.
L'AZR Redux de Papaw est basé sur le skin original Arctic Zephyr créé par jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se veut simple, propre, minimaliste et extrêmement personnalisable.
L'AZR Redux de Papaw est basé sur le skin original Arctic Zephyr créé par jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se veut simple, propre, minimaliste et extrêmement personnalisable.
Papaw's AZR Redux sukurtas remiantis originalia Arctic Zephyr oda, kurią sukūrė jurialmunkey. Papaw AZR Redux yra paprastas, švarus, minimalistinis ir labai pritaikomas.
Papaw's AZR Redux is gebaseerd op de originele Arctic Zephyr-skin gemaakt door jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux gaat over eenvoudig, strak, minimalistisch en uiterst aanpasbaar.
Papaw's AZR Redux opiera się na oryginalnej skórce Arctic Zephyr stworzonej przez Jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux ma być prosty, czysty, minimalistyczny i niezwykle konfigurowalny.
Papaw's AZR Redux se bazează pe pielea originală Arctic Zephyr creată de jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux este despre a fi simplu, curat, minimalist și extrem de personalizabil.
AZR Redux от Papaw основан на оригинальном скине Arctic Zephyr, созданном jurialmunkey. AZR Redux от Papaw — простой, понятный, минималистичный и чрезвычайно настраиваемый.
extension.description: [CR]Als je je waardering wilt tonen voor de tijd en moeite die ik in deze projecten heb gestoken, scan dan het "Koffiekopje" (QR-code) hierboven en koop [COLOR deepskyblue]een kopje koffie[/COLOR] of bezoek [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR] om je te abonneren voor toegang tot "What's Next" en alle toekomstige updates.[CR][CR][COLOR limegreen]Vrijgevigheid zoals die van jou is tegenwoordig zeldzaam. Ik dank u bij voorbaat voor uw steun. Ik ben erg dankbaar voor ELKE donatie en waardeer je vriendelijkheid enorm![/COLOR][COLOR hemelsblauw] • De Papaja[/COLOR]

[CR]If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please scan the "Coffee Cup" (QR code) above and buy me [COLOR deepskyblue]a cup of coffee[/COLOR] or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR] to subscribe for access to "What's Next" and all future updates.[CR][CR][COLOR limegreen]Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for EVERY donation and truly appreciate your kindness![/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]

[CR]If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please scan the "Coffee Cup" (QR code) above and buy me [COLOR deepskyblue]a cup of coffee[/COLOR] or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR] to subscribe for access to "What's Next" and all future updates.[CR][CR][COLOR limegreen]Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for EVERY donation and truly appreciate your kindness![/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]

[CR]If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please scan the "Coffee Cup" (QR code) above and buy me [COLOR deepskyblue]a cup of coffee[/COLOR] or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR] to subscribe for access to "What's Next" and all future updates.[CR][CR][COLOR limegreen]Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for EVERY donation and truly appreciate your kindness![/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]

[CR]Si vous souhaitez montrer votre appréciation pour le temps et les efforts que j'ai consacrés à ces projets, veuillez scanner la "Tasse à café" (code QR) ci-dessus et achetez-moi [COLOR deepskyblue]une tasse de café[/COLOR] ou visitez [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR] pour vous abonner et accéder à "What's Next" et à toutes les futures mises à jour.[CR][CR][COLOR limegreen]Une générosité comme la vôtre est rare à trouver de nos jours. Je vous remercie d'avance pour votre soutien. Je suis très reconnaissant pour CHAQUE don et j'apprécie vraiment votre gentillesse ![/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]
